title: Any item can't be selected at the first time in library outline view.
description:
Description: When using the library outline view, I am unable to select any item on the first attempt.

Steps to reproduce:
1. Open the library outline view.
2. Try to select any item in the outline view.

OB: When I try to select an item in the library outline view for the first time, the focus jumps to the library file node.

EB: The item should be successfully selected on the first attempt.

SR: 
1. Open the library outline view.
2. Try to select any item in the outline view. The item should be selectable without the focus jumping to the library file node.
